__e: We're watching the exact same troupe you saw in 1990?
You're the only troops that I've got now.
We'd been combing the countryside the biggest posse I could round up.
She was with the group we caught earlier, my lord.
Whoever comes onstage and sings with me... I'll give my father's troupe to him!
My crew and I are not alone.
I've been with this group for a short time, and I am still struck by how wonderful all of you are.
Send a team to Dilerkot, and kill him. - You got it!
Why on earth aren't you investigating the Terrible Tenners over this gang death?
But we are here to tell you that your company is in danger.
It isn't essential for you to love me to be in the troupe.
I didn't say anything. I was afraid I'd lose my place on the forces.
I'll do anything to stay on the force, anything, please.
